I work as an applied statistician with a specific interest in statistical methods applied to ecology and environmental sciences. I currently hold a position at University Bretagne Sud as associate professor in statistics (IUT Vannes, Data Science department) in the GIS group of the Lab-STICC (UMR 6285).
